member.name: M:Invoice_Manager_API.Controllers.InvoiceRowsController.GetAllByInvoiceId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all invoice rows associated with the specified invoice ID.
member.returns: A list of invoice rows for the specified invoice.

member.name: M:Invoice_Manager_API.Controllers.InvoiceRowsController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific invoice row by its unique identifier.
member.param: The identifier of the invoice row.
member.returns: The invoice row if found; otherwise, a 404 Not Found response.

member.name: M:Invoice_Manager_API.Controllers.InvoiceRowsController.Create(Invoice_Manager_API.DTO.InvoiceRowDTO.InvoiceRowCreateRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new invoice row.
member.param: The invoice row creation request data.
member.returns: The newly created invoice row with a 201 Created response.

member.name: M:Invoice_Manager_API.Controllers.InvoiceRowsController.Update(Invoice_Manager_API.DTO.InvoiceRowDTO.InvoiceRowUpdateRequest,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates an existing invoice row by its identifier.
member.param: The identifier of the invoice row to update.
member.returns: The updated invoice row if found; otherwise, a 404 Not Found response.
